alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:01PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Okanogan County through 530 PM PDT... At 501 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Okanogan, or 11 miles southeast of Omak, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nespelem Community and Disautel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
